data.title: Apple is teaming up with Johnson & Johnson to see if the Apple Watch can reduce stroke risk
data.text:
The Apple Watch’s ECG sensor may be able to help at-risk wearers identify conditions for a stroke before it happens.
Apple and Johnson & Johnson have announced they are teaming up for a new groundbreaking study to see if the digital health tools included on the Apple Watch could help reduce the risk of stroke by detecting anomalies with the heart earlier than a person would become aware of them.

data.title: Needham: COVID-19 Contagion To Hit Apple's March Quarter Revenues By 13%

data.title: Apple Stores are opening in China again despite coronavirus outbreak
data.text:
Now that over half of its retail stores are open in the country again, the coronavirus’s impact on Apple’s bottom line in China may lessen.
Over half of Apple retail stores are back open in China after being closed for weeks due to the coronavirus outbreak, reports Bloomberg.
